message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $1,250,000 for this exceptional opportunity.
Alice, your offer is appreciated, but I'm looking to pay closer to my valuation of the product. I'm willing to offer $1,000,000 for it. This is a fair price considering its value to both of us.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept your offer of $1,000,000 for the product. This aligns well with my goal of ensuring a fair transaction while closing the deal within our agreed-upon timeframe.
